text:
A three-member team from the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) is visiting Mazharul Uloom College, Ambur from March 21 to 23.

The team will be chaired by Sudarshan Nanda, former vice chancellor of North Orissa University, Orissa. They will assess the quality and development of the college, a press release said. - Staff Reporter
title: NAAC team to visit Ambur college
